Entries.Guitar_Gt1: %Sam seems lost in his music. Better not disturb him.
Entries.Guitar_Gt2: Oh, hi @! What do you think? I wrote it for a certain someone. Oh, I'm not saying who.$10
Entries.Guitar_Gt3: Dad needed quiet this morning. And here I can play as loud as I like!

Entries.Guitar_Gt1: I love listening to Sam play. He's good, isn't he?$1
Entries.Guitar_Gt2: Oh? I've read this paragraph six times already.$4
Entries.Guitar_Gt3: This book has an excellent soundtrack, don't you think?$1

Entries.Guitar_Gt1: Oh, am I here to watch Sam play? Of course not! I'm here to read my book, see?$1
Entries.Guitar_Gt2: *sighs* Sometimes I even wonder if he realizes I exist.$2
Entries.Guitar_Gt3: Ever wished romance were like it was in books? Yeah, me too.$2
